Break Point Hand Limit.name: Break Point Hand Limit
Break Point Hand Limit.effect: Continuously double your own Break point and reduce your own hand limit to 3 cards.

Counter Brace.name: Counter Brace
Counter Brace.effect: Temporarily increase target Thinker's Break point by the total Power of a target card.

Continuous Overload.name: Continuous Overload
Continuous Overload.effect: Continuously increase the Cost of all opposing Thoughts by 1.

Disengage.name: Disengage
Disengage.effect: Immediately Disengage a target Thought or Group.

Double Break Point.name: Double Break Point
Double Break Point.effect: Temporarily double a target Thinker's Break point.

End-turn Disengage.name: End-turn Disengage
End-turn Disengage.effect: Continuously Disengage target Thought at the end of a Turn. If target is removed, remove this card.

Hand Decoy.name: Hand Decoy
Hand Decoy.effect: Immediately choose a card from your hand when a card would be removed and discard it instead.

Misdirection.name: Misdirection
Misdirection.effect: Immediately change the target of an engagement.

Negate Effect.name: Negate Effect
Negate Effect.effect: Temporarily negate the effect of a target card in play.

Negate Intellect.name: Negate Intellect
Negate Intellect.effect: Immediately negate the effect of an Intellect, including Cerebral Intellect, in play and remove it.

Power-amp IV.name: Power-amp IV
Power-amp IV.effect: Temporarily increase the Power of all target Thinker's Thoughts by 4.

Power-amp X.name: Power-amp X
Power-amp X.effect: Temporarily increase the Power of all target Thinker's Thoughts by 10.

Power-down.name: Power-down
Power-down.effect: Temporarily halve the Power of a target card or Group.

Power-drain.name: Power-drain
Power-drain.effect: Temporarily reduce the Power of a target card to 0.

Recall.name: Recall
Recall.effect: Immediately return one target card in play back to the top of its respective deck.

Focus Recovery.name: Focus Recovery
Focus Recovery.effect: Immediately gain 1 Focus Counter. This card can only be played as a response to loosing a Focus Counter.

Memory Loss.name: Memory Loss
Memory Loss.effect: Immediately choose three cards from your deck, discard them, and shuffle your deck.

Thought Cannon.name: Thought Cannon
Thought Cannon.effect: Immediately choose a Thought or Group you control and remove it from play, engage target Thinker with a power equal to the total Power equal to the chosen Thought or Group.

Recollection.name: Recollection
Recollection.effect: Immediately play any card from your discard pile.

Thought Tribute.name: Thought Tribute
Thought Tribute.effect: Immediately remove a Thought you crontrol and play any card from your discard pile with less cost.

Thought Recollection.name: Thought Recollection
Thought Recollection.effect: Immediately choose a Thought from a Thinker's discard pile and play it under that Thinker's control.

Intellect Break.name: Intellect Break
Intellect Break.effect: Immediately negate and remove a single target Thinker's Intellect in play; target Thinker may discard the top 3 cards of their deck to negate this card.

Thought Break.name: Thought Break
Thought Break.effect: Immediately remove a single target Thinker's Thought in play; target Thinker may discard the top 3 cards of their deck to negate this card.

Engagement Break.name: Engagement Break
Engagement Break.effect: Immediately negate the resolution of an engagement; any Thinker may discard the top 3 cards of their deck to negate this card.

Ready Break.name: Ready Break
Ready Break.effect: Immediately engage a single target Thinker's Thought or Group in play; target Thinker may discard the top 3 cards of their deck to negate this card.

Reload Consciousness.name: Reload Consciousness
Reload Consciousness.effect: Immediately discard the hand of all Thinkers. All Thinkers then draw the same number of cards they discarded from their deck.

Amnesia Blast.name: Amnesia Blast
Amnesia Blast.effect: Immediately discard the hand of target Thinker whos discard pile contains 15 or more cards.

Removal Amnesia.name: Removal Amnesia
Removal Amnesia.effect: Temporarily discard the top card of target Thinker's deck when a card they own is removed from play.

Conflict Mark.name: Conflict Mark
Conflict Mark.effect: Continuously mark Thoughts that resolve an engagement.

Intellect Mark.name: Intellect Mark
Intellect Mark.effect: Temporality mark Thinkers that play Intellects.

Discard Mark.name: Discard Mark
Discard Mark.effect: Continuously mark Thinkers that discard cards from their hands.

Mark.name: Mark
Mark.effect: Immediately mark one card in play.

Mark Thought.name: Mark Thought
Mark Thought.effect: Immediately mark one Thought or Group in play.

Remove Marked.name: Remove Marked
Remove Marked.effect: Immediately remove a marked Thought or Intellect in play.

Negate Marked.name: Negate Marked
Negate Marked.effect: Temporality negate the effect of all marked cards.

Power-down Marked.name: Power-down Marked
Power-down Marked.effect: Temporality halve the power of all marked Thoughts.

Group Marked.name: Group Marked
Group Marked.effect: Immediately group target Thinker's Thoughts that are marked and engage them.
